caption: This photograph captures a scene of industrial or possibly residential air pollution. In the foreground, there's a rooftop overlaid with multiple tall chimneys emitting white and gray smoke into the air. The background is filled with dense, lush green trees forming a hill, slightly obscured by the haze of the smoke. The atmosphere is suffused with a muted purplish tone, possibly due to the photographic filter or the natural lighting conditions, which adds a somewhat somber or polluted feel to the scene. The image may be highlighting environmental concerns related to air quality and industrial emissions.
title: Union Carbide's ferro Alloy plant at Alloy, WV., on U.S. Route 60
